lyrics:
13 contributorsso happy lyricsput the bottle down finally got somethin to say

ever wonder what i been thinkin about 
i been thinkin bout throwin you out

sent you packing look whos laughin now
im so happy that i feel this way
im so happy that i threw you away

take a good look at yourself and see whos really to blame
needless to say you got issues
theres no fuckin way that im gonna fix you
its never the same ever since you went fallin down down down

i been thinkin bout throwin you out
